name: Blue dude (BreixoGames)
description:
A simple 2D platformer game
  • Only playable in browser,   move using keyboard and shoot with spacebar.
  • You will level up when you get 50 crystals.
  • Don't drop any crystal on the ground.
  • I hope you have fun trying out the 5  levels.
  • Audio on/off - a

Try not to die soon

Enjoy it!!!!
